buddy_profile.name: Derek Lee
buddy_profile.title: Head of Sales - BSI Group Singapore
buddy_profile.introduction: With more than 7 years of experience in the Testing, Inspection and Certification (TIC) Industry, I'm passionate about enabling organizations to drive improvement that produces exceptional business outcomes using international standards. I have worked with hundreds of organizations to embed international standards, drive excellence, and achieve certifications for their businesses.
buddy_profile.experience: 7+ years in Testing, Inspection and Certification (TIC) Industry
buddy_profile.specialization: Enabling organizations to drive improvement using international standards
buddy_profile.how_to_help: I would love to share about my career development journey as a sustainability professional and provide insights on corporate sustainability trends. I am also happy to discuss career development and training needs to help new and interested professionals develop their careers.
buddy_profile.sustainability_motivation: The work that I do is closely related to International Standards. I'm passionate about sharing how standards can benefit companies by driving real, meaningful and lasting organizational change, and enabling better sustainability outcomes.
buddy_profile.organizational_responsibilities: I am part of our team's APAC Carbon Reduction Community which drives carbon reduction initiatives, best practices, and tracking at a national level.
buddy_profile.challenges_and_solutions: I faced a lack of resources, manpower, and tools to track sustainability metrics.
buddy_profile.proudest_achievement: I am most proud of my work with leading organizations in adopting standards and serving their business assurance needs.
buddy_profile.standards_focus: International standards for organizational change and sustainability outcomes
